Text: Tobacco and nicotine e-cigarette makers Imperial Brands and British American Tobacco shed 3.5% and 1.8%, respectively, as the U.S. Congress began hearings this week about a mystery vaping-related lung disease.
Cause: the U.S. Congress began hearings this week about a mystery vaping-related lung disease.
Effect: Tobacco and nicotine e-cigarette makers Imperial Brands and British American Tobacco shed 3.5% and 1.8%, respectively,
